resources.string: \ Scroggle is Boggle, but with an UTTT special twist.\n\ User find words and score points depending the letters choosen \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

\ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

\ The game is divided into two phases. In the first phase select 9 words from each grid and click on check word to conform if the word exists.\n\ Timer is set to 1 minute each for both the phases. \n\In the phase 2 select 1 word combining the correct words from phase1. Bonus 20 points for a 9 letter word
